branding.name: Passenger
branding.slogan: Because your security should not be a passenger on someone else's vehicle.

recovery.title: Cover your Vault
recovery.description: A recovery key is automatically generated for you. If you forget your passphrase, you can use this key to recover your Vault. You should save it in a safe place. Think it is the PUK on Sim card of your Vault.
recovery.warning: DO NOT LOSE THIS KEY. IF YOU LOSE IT, YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO RECOVER YOUR VAULT.

checkIfNoted.title: Double Checking
checkIfNoted.description: I wonder if you have saved your recovery key in a safe place. Can you write it down?

letsStart.title: Let's Start
letsStart.description: You are all set! You can now start using your Vault.

forgotPassphrase.title: Forgot My Keys
forgotPassphrase.description: While creating your Vault, we have generated a recovery key for you. The PUK code of your Vault. Remember it? It's required now.

assignedPassphrase.title: Assigned Passphrase
assignedPassphrase.description: Here is your new passphrase. You can change it after login.

accounts.notFound: No accounts found. Add one to get started.

form.noTags: No tags found. Add one to list them here.

accountDetails.title: Account Details
accountDetails.description: Here lies the details of your account.

deleteModal.title: Are you sure?
deleteModal.description: This action cannot be undone. Still, the history will be remain and affect your total score.

similarityModal.description: We use Levenshtein distance to find similar passphrases.
similarityModal.title: Similarity Check

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Manage and add tags to your accounts.
tags.noTags: No tags found. Let's add one.

form.name: Name
form.iconDescription: Choose one of the beautiful icons.

tagDetails.title: Tag Details
tagDetails.description: You can tag your accounts with this.

deleteModal.title: Are you sure?
deleteModal.description: Accounts tagged with this will be kept, but this deletion cannot be undone.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Manage and add tags to your accounts.

wordlists.title: Wordlists
wordlists.description: Import and manage brute force wordlists.

analyses.title: Analyses
analyses.description: Initialize new analysis or view their reports.

leaks.title: Leaks
leaks.description: Get the known leaks and breaches.

leaks.title: Leaks
leaks.description: Get the known leaks and breaches.

news.title: News
news.description: Here is the latest 12 leaks that validated by Have I Been Pwned.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: Here is the statistics of your Vault.

strengthGraph.title: Strength Over Time
strengthGraph.description: Unlike other strength graphs, this one shows the total strength of your Vault over time. Calculated by days.

wordLists.title: Wordlists
wordLists.description: Import and manage wordlists. You can brute force yourself before hackers do!
wordLists.flow: Add wordlist repositories. Download, validate. Start an analysis from the Analyses menu.
wordLists.noWordlists: No wordlists found. Add one to get started.

wordListAdd.title: Add Wordlist Repository
wordListAdd.description: The URL you enter should contain a raw JSON data.

analyses.title: Analyses
analyses.description: Brute force your accounts before hackers do!

list.description: You can use validated wordlists to brute force your accounts.

analysisReport.title: Analysis Report
analysisReport.description: Here is the report of the analysis.

import-accounts.title: Import Accounts
import-accounts.description: Import from browser and password managers.

export-accounts.title: Export Accounts
export-accounts.description: Export CSV for browser and password managers.

import.title: Import Accounts
import.subtitle: Import from browser and password managers.
import.description: Passenger will detect the type of the file you upload and import the accounts accordingly.

export.title: Export Accounts
export.subtitle: Export to browser and password managers.
export.description: You can chose which format you want to export to.

changePassphrase.title: Change Master Passphrase
changePassphrase.description: Master passphrase is your keyto login to your Vault.

strictMode.title: Strict Mode
strictMode.description: Use your preferred wordlist to block adding weak passphrases while adding new accounts.

wordlist.title: Wordlist
wordlist.description: Select the wordlist you want to use for strict mode.

checks.uppercase: Add uppercase letters for stronger password
checks.lowercase: Add lowercase letters for stronger password
checks.special: Add special characters for stronger password
checks.length: Add more characters for stronger password
checks.minLength: Password must be at least {{minLength}} characters long

errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.alreadyInitialized: You have already initialized your Vault.

validation.min: Password must be at least {{min}} characters long.
validation.max: Password must be at most {{max}} characters long.
validation.masterPassphrase: Password must contain at least 2 lowercase letters, 2 uppercase letters, 2 numbers, and 2 special characters (!@#$%^&*,.?":{}|<>)
